introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.subtitle: Welcome to SheBalance
introduction.description: SheBalance is a financial management app designed to help individuals and businesses track sales, manage expenses, monitor inventory, save money, and keep proper financial records. This manual provides a simple step-by-step guide on how to use the app effectively.
introduction.step1: Track sales and revenue with ease
introduction.step4: Create savings plans and monitor progress
introduction.step5: Maintain clean financial records in one place

gettingStarted.title: Create an Account & Login
gettingStarted.subtitle: Account Creation & Login
gettingStarted.description: Create your SheBalance account and sign in to access your dashboard.
gettingStarted.step1: To download the SheBalance app on Android, visit www.shebalance.org and click on the install prompt when it appears
gettingStarted.step2: To download the SheBalance app on iOS, visit www.shebalance.org on safari, click the share button, then the 'Add to Home Screen' button
gettingStarted.step3: Open the app and tap on 'Create Account'.
gettingStarted.step4: Fill in your details such as name, phone number, and password.
gettingStarted.step5: Confirm your account (you may receive a code via email).
gettingStarted.step6: To Login, Enter your phone number/email and password to log in.
gettingStarted.step7: After logging in, you will be directed to the Dashboard.
